item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcome This will be a place to collect my thoughts, and share interesting tech that i discover along my career. Thanks to the Hugo protocol posting the journey online will now be as painless as possible.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About I’ve been in the animation industry for 10+ years and a rigger for more then 8. I really enjoy the gratifcaiton I get from solving complex problems. I’ve recently gained an interest in software dev and how these tools can help VFX produciton. I’m currently using vim pycharm git/bash obsidian maya, blender, ue5 And trying to improve my workflow everyday.

item.title: Donation
item.description: Donate If for some reason you’re feeling generous, please donate the right way and send crypto. Monero: Litecoin: Bitcoin:
